name: ColorMan (NightHz)
description:
W/A/S/D -> Move red dot

E -> Start game

R -> Restart game

Esc -> Exit game

Other dots is enemies!

You give the floor color,  and enemies remove the color of the floor.

Winning conditions : Color/All > 70%

 Made for "Weekly Game Jam - Week 112"
Theme: "Color the world"
